title: 2nd Annual USC Social Work Toy Drive Showcase
desc: Celebrate the holidays and reconnect with your favorite Trojans, meet fellow alumni and bring your family and friends! We'll showcase the final toy drive outcome in style with a holiday reunion. Enjoy drinks, food, desserts, awesome door prize giveaways and live performances. Remember to bring a gift for a child in need! Gifts can include toys, sporting goods, books, personal grooming products, clothes, and/or art supplies. All gifts should be new, unwrapped and valued at a minimum of $5. Sponsored by:
